Package com.sicomsa.dmt

Interface DMTClient

All Known Implementing Classes:
Client
public interface DMTClient
DMTClient contains methods needed for a contributor to download cfdis, and store them, at particular stages of the download process.
Since:
1.0
Version:
2020-10-12
Author:
Beto Lopez

  • Method Details

    • getRfc

      String getRfc()
      Returns the RFC of this client.
      Returns:
      the RFC of this client

    • requestDownload

      SolicitaResponse requestDownload(jakarta.xml.soap.SOAPConnection connection, Query query) throws jakarta.xml.soap.SOAPException
      Calls SAT's request download service from SAT with the provided connection and query, returning a decoded response.
      Parameters:
      connection - the soap connection to use
      query - the request with its filters to send
      Returns:
      SAT's response encapsulated in a SolicitaResponse
      Throws:
      jakarta.xml.soap.SOAPException - if there was a SOAP related problem
      IllegalArgumentException - if connection or query are null
      jakarta.xml.ws.WebServiceException - if there were other service related problems
      See Also:
      • SolicitaResponse

    • verifyRequest

      VerificaResponse verifyRequest(jakarta.xml.soap.SOAPConnection connection, String requestId) throws jakarta.xml.soap.SOAPException
      Calls SAT's verify request service with the given connection on the given requestId.
      Parameters:
      connection - the connection to use to connect
      requestId - the requestId "IdSolicitud" to be verified
      Returns:
      SAT's response to the verify request encapsulated in a VerificaResponse
      Throws:
      jakarta.xml.soap.SOAPException - if there was a SOAP error
      IllegalArgumentException - if connection or requestId are null
      jakarta.xml.ws.WebServiceException - if there were other service related problems
      See Also:
      • VerificaResponse

    • download

      DescargaResponse download(jakarta.xml.soap.SOAPConnection connection, String packageId) throws jakarta.xml.soap.SOAPException
      Calls SAT's download service for the given packageId using the connection received
      Parameters:
      connection - the connection to be used
      packageId - the packageId to download
      Returns:
      SAT's reponse encapsulated in a DescargaResponse
      Throws:
      jakarta.xml.soap.SOAPException - if there was a SOAP error
      IllegalArgumentException - if connection or packageId are null
      jakarta.xml.ws.WebServiceException - if there were other service related problems
      See Also:
      • DescargaResponse

    • save

      void save(String packageId, String encodedPackage)
      Saves the encodedPackage in an user defined repository.
      Parameters:
      packageId - the packageId of the package to be saved
      encodedPackage - the package to be saved
      Throws:
      RepositoryException - if there was a problem while saving the package

    • getCertificate

      X509Certificate getCertificate()
      Returns the X509Certificate of this client. This method will also load the certificate if under lazy load.
      Returns:
      the X509Certificate of this client.
      Throws:
      jakarta.xml.ws.WebServiceException - if there were other service related problems
